resources.string: In Collect Example Data you can collect raw acceleration data which will be saved on the phone and can be used to train a model. You can either train a new model or use an already trained model. If you use this app for the first time there is no pre trained model and the kNN and TL model will behave randomly.
You can also create a confusion matrix for the pre trained model or load the last model which was trained in "Train a New Model" and did not overwrite the pre trained model.
1) Select the activity you want to record:
2) Press the "Collect Data" Button. It starts after 3 seconds to give you some time to put the mobile phone at the correct spot.
Every activity needs at least 5 instances. The array below depicts the number of instances for each activity and follows the same order as the dropdown menu.

When the Stop Collecting Data button is pressed the last second of the recorded acceleration values will be deleted. This is because of the movement the user does when stopping the recording which is not related to the activity.
Pressing the button below overwrites the old raw acceleration files if the instance counter for the activity is bigger than 0.
1) The collected data gets loaded and the instance counter below will update, when its fully loaded.
2) Press the button below to start the training.
The array below depicts how many instances you collected for each activity.
Press the button below to calculate the confusion matrix. The pre trained model will be used.
Or you can load the last calculated confusion matrix.
Feature Matrix could not be loaded

The generic model has no activity running, but it has in between activities like STAND_TO_SIT or SIT_TO_LIE. The sum of all those in between activities is summed and displayed as the running activity.
